statements: SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, profile_picture_url FROM user_profile ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM user_profile WHERE email_address = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM user_profile WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profile ORDER BY full_name ASC, email_address DESC;
SELECT user_id, profile_picture_url FROM user_profile WHERE profile_picture_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_profile;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, bio FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL AND profile_pic IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, permission_level FROM user_profiles JOIN access_permissions USING(user_id);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE bio LIKE '%web developer%';
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_permissions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, email, full_name FROM user_profiles;
SELECT permission_id, permission_level, user_id FROM access_permissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT title, content, creation_date FROM knowledge_base WHERE title LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT article_id, title, creation_date FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT title, content FROM knowledge_base WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_id, title FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, email, date_joined FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccessPermissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin' AND granted = true;
SELECT article_id, title, author_id FROM KnowledgeBaseArticles WHERE date_created > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT article_id, title, date_created FROM KnowledgeBaseArticles WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM AccessPermissions WHERE granted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ArticleComments WHERE comment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, COUNT(ac.article_id) AS total_comments FROM UserProfiles u JOIN ArticleComments ac ON u.user_id = ac.commenter_id GROUP BY u.user_id, u.username ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT title, created_date FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, created_date FROM knowledge_base WHERE author_id = 3 ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT article_id, tag_name FROM knowledge_base kb JOIN article_tags at ON kb.article_id = at.article_id JOIN tags t ON at.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'Database';

SELECT u.username, kp.permission_level FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN knowledge_base kb ON u.user_id = kb.author_id JOIN article_tags at ON kb.article_id = at.article_id JOIN tags t ON at.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'Security' AND kp.permission_level = 'Admin';
